codes.ACCC: Settlement on the creditor's account has been completed.
codes.ACCP: Preceding check of technical validation was successful. Customer profile check was also successful.
codes.ACFC: Preceding check of technical validation and customer profile was successful and an automatic funds check was positive.
codes.ACFW: Preceding check of technical validation and customer profile was successful, and an automatic funds check was positive, but an explicit confirmation by the initiating party is outstanding.
codes.ACIS: Payment instruction to issue a cheque has been accepted, and the cheque has been issued but not yet been deposited or cleared.
codes.ACPD: Status of transaction released from the Debtor Agent and accepted by the clearing.
codes.ACSC: Settlement completed. Usage : this can be used by a Market Infrastructure reporting to Infrastructure Participant or an Account Servicer to Account Owner to report that the transaction account entry has been completed. Warning : this status is provided for transaction status reasons, not for financial information. It can only be used after bilateral agreement
codes.ACSP: All preceding checks such as technical validation and customer profile were successful and therefore the payment instruction has been accepted for execution.
codes.ACTC: Authentication and syntactical and semantical validation are successful
codes.ACWC: Instruction is accepted but a change will be made, such as date or remittance not sent.
codes.ACWP: Payment instruction included in the credit transfer is accepted without being posted to the creditor customer’s account.
codes.BLCK: Payment transaction previously reported with status 'ACWP' is blocked, for example, funds will neither be posted to the Creditor's account, nor be returned to the Debtor.
codes.CANC: Payment initiation has been successfully cancelled after having received a request for cancellation. Usage: code to be used in the context of APIs only.
codes.CPUC: Cash has been picked up by the Creditor.
codes.PATC: Payment initiation needs multiple authentications, where some but not yet all have been performed. Syntactical and semantical validations are successful.
codes.PDNG: Payment instruction is pending. Further checks and status update will be performed.
codes.PRES: Request for Payment has been presented to the Debtor.
codes.RCVC: Verification of Payee check has been applied to received transaction stating to be complete without mismatching data.
codes.RVCM: Verification of Payee checks have been applied to received transaction stating to be completed containing mismatching data.
codes.RVMC: Verification of Payee check has been applied to received transaction stating to be complete with data matching closely.
codes.RVNA: Verification of Payee check has been applied to received transaction stating to be complete with not applicable data.
codes.RVNC: Verification of party check on the transaction is not yet completed.
codes.RVNM: Verification of Payee check has been applied to received transaction stating to be complete with mismatching data.

description: Specifies the status of an individual payment instructions, as published in an external payment transaction status code set.
name: ExternalPaymentTransactionStatus1Code
